component.name: NiaAML-GUI
component.summary: A basic graphical user interface intended for users of the NiaAML Python package.

description.p: NiaAML GUI application allows you to use main features of the NiaAML framework. There are two views in the application. In the first one, you can prepare an environment for a pipeline optimization process. The purpose of the second one is to allow you to use an existing pipeline from a file. The application currently supports data input in a form of CSV files.
